hero_title: Build beautiful and performant React apps with ease
hero_description: Our component library empowers developers with customizable, accessible UI elements optimized for React ecosystems.
ready_to_use: Ready to use in your projects
features_description: Lightweight and fast components, designed specifically for React applications.
themes_description: Supports effortless customization with light, dark, and custom themes.
apis_description: Simple, intuitive props enabling full control over your components.
documentation_description: Comprehensive, clear documentation to ease your development experience.
simple_card_description: Clean, minimal card with action support.
feature_card_description: Highlight your app's features with style.
getting_started_step_one_description: Install with npm or yarn for easy integration.
getting_started_step_2_description: Import only what you need from the library to keep bundles small.
getting_started_step_3_description: Apply components directly with easy-to-use props.
